articles.description: The images went viral because it was the first time Grimes, whose real name is Claire Boucher, had been seen since confirming she’d “semi-separated” from Elon Musk.
articles.content:
It’s Grimes’ “Realiti” — we’re just living in it.
Elon Musk’s quirky pop-star ex has admitted to deliberately posing for now-viral photos of her thumbing through The Communist Manifesto — to get the… [+1939 chars]
